EmailTemplate.name: 201906_Global_Email_OvationSelect_TM.201906_Global_Email_JetWaveDemoDuncan_TM
EmailTemplate.subject: Test the New Standard for In-Flight Wi-Fi
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Experience JetWave and Jet ConneX live at the Duncan Aviation facility (PVU) – Tuesday July 9th, 11 a.m. to 4 p.m.
The secret is out, consistent global high-speed Wi-Fi is available now to stream videos, connect to VPNs, download large files and more - anywhere you fly! See for yourself how you can get revolutionary in-flight Wi-Fi for that office and home-like connectivity in the sky.
Join us on Tuesday July 9th from 11 a.m. to 4 p.m. to see the newest technology to help you stay connected. Put our JetWave™ <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/safety-and-connectivity/jetwave-high-speed-satellite-communications-hardware?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiWTJRNE9XSmpaRFJsTkdJMCIsInQiOiJMVGdtc3RwWFwvUG96R0xFZzY0RExUaVMwN3M0NjFPMU80WWduUVIrUHBSQkduNENyZERybUkwd1VXQkVIVUtaQlJxbFB2T1JTblJjcWdSQzdPQ2JjS2c9PSJ9]]> system which exclusively powers Jet ConneX <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/jet-connex?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiWTJRNE9XSmpaRFJsTkdJMCIsInQiOiJMVGdtc3RwWFwvUG96R0xFZzY0RExUaVMwN3M0NjFPMU80WWduUVIrUHBSQkduNENyZERybUkwd1VXQkVIVUtaQlJxbFB2T1JTblJjcWdSQzdPQ2JjS2c9PSJ9]]> to the ultimate Wi-Fi test onboard Honeywell's Falcon 7X. Don’t be left missing this!
Duncan Aviation Inc. 262 South 3800 West Provo, UT 84601 July 9, 2019
While you’re there, get an in-depth view of the Honeywell GoDirect™ <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/service-listing/godirect-cabin?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiWTJRNE9XSmpaRFJsTkdJMCIsInQiOiJMVGdtc3RwWFwvUG96R0xFZzY0RExUaVMwN3M0NjFPMU80WWduUVIrUHBSQkduNENyZERybUkwd1VXQkVIVUtaQlJxbFB2T1JTblJjcWdSQzdPQ2JjS2c9PSJ9]]> suite of services and our Ovation cabin management system <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/safety-and-connectivity/honeywell-ovation-select-cabin-management-system?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiWTJRNE9XSmpaRFJsTkdJMCIsInQiOiJMVGdtc3RwWFwvUG96R0xFZzY0RExUaVMwN3M0NjFPMU80WWduUVIrUHBSQkduNENyZERybUkwd1VXQkVIVUtaQlJxbFB2T1JTblJjcWdSQzdPQ2JjS2c9PSJ9]]>.
Please RSVP to me at Nicholas.Davis@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Nicholas.Davis@Honeywell.com]]>.
